creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: travelers crossing a tall wooden bridge: at R, an older man with a white and blue fan leads a young child looking after his lost kite at UR; two older travelers bend over near center of bridge while a younger child dances behind; farmers work in a rice bog at R; a bay in distance and mountains in background; red kite on long red string enters scene at L and rises out of top border
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar ULQ; UL edge
title: Kakegawa, from "53 Stations of the Tokaido Road"
